*/ ,zeb.DIA_POISDESC /* */ ,zeb.DIA_POISCODE /* */ ,zeb.DIA_CLINICDESC /* 临床诊断 */ ,zeb.DIA_CLINICICD /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISDESC1 /* 治疗措施 */ ,zeb.DIA_DISICD1 /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISDESC2 /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISICD2 /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISDESC3 /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISICD3 /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISDESC4 /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISICD4 /* */ ,zeb.DIA_DISDESC5 /* */ FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT * FROM zy_emr_basy where 1=1 ) A WHERE #{startRow} + #{pageSize}>= ROWNUM) zeb left outer join (select max(d.dictname) as VISIT_STATUS, PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ORDER from PV_RECORD t inner join dictinfo d on t.VISIT_STATUS = d.dictcode group by PATIENT_ID,VISIT_ORDER) p on (zeb.inpatient = p.PATIENT_ID ) WHERE zeb.RN >= #{startRow}
